alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 16 at 2:21PM PST until December 17 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 29 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte, Mendocino Coast and Northern Humboldt Coast Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast
